title: 'New Yorker' On Secret Civilian Efforts To Save America's ISIS Hostages
teaser: Renee Montagne talks to Lawrence Wright of The New Yorker about his article on the impact of U.S. hostage policy on 5 families whose children where held hostage in Syria by the Islamic State.
